alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; Grant; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 08 at 2:37PM CST until March 10 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THURSDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Wilkin, West Otter Tail, East Otter Tail and Grant Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM Thursday to midnight CST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Otter Tail; Grant; West Otter Tail; Wilkin
